attributes.action: Make The Navigation Inn Public House Exempt From The Smoking Ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make The Busines premises of 
The Navigation Inn 
Whaley Bridge
High Peak
Exempt from The Government Smoking ban to start 1st July 2007 and to let the licencee make the decision to designate their own smoking and non-smoking policies in accordance with their own business plans and projections.

A recent poll of regular customers indicate that 92% of them are regular or social smokers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
